title: Justin and Hailey Bieber look downcast as they step out together in LA... two weeks after wedding
text:
They married for the second time in South Carolina two weeks ago.

And it was back to normal life on Monday when Justin, 25, and Hailey Bieber, 22, were spotted running errands around Los Angeles.

The newlyweds appeared slightly downcast attempted to keep a low profile and hid from cameras.

Not in the best spirits: Justin and Hailey Bieber were spotted looking slightly downcast on Monday when they stepped out together in Los Angeles to run some errands

Justin opted for his original white Drew House T-shirt and a pair of long purple basketball shorts.

The singer completed his look with a black cap and a pair of slippers despite being outdoors around town.

Hailey joined the Sorry singer for the outing in an oversized Harley Davidson sweater.

Casual: Hailey joined the Sorry singer for the outing in an oversized Harley Davidson sweater

Comfortable look: The model drew attention to her long lean legs with a pair of loose-fitting mom jeans that were cuffed at the ankle

The model drew attention to her long lean legs with a pair of loose-fitting mom jeans that were cuffed at the ankle.

Hailey accessorised with a pair of sunglasses over her eyes and styled her blonde hair out into gorgeous waves.

She appeared to be wearing a very minimal amount of makeup for the outing.

Hailey also took to her Instagram Stories to share a monochrome shot of Justin carrying her with his face in her chest.

Loose fitting: Justin opted for his original white Drew House T-shirt and a pair of long purple basketball shorts

Don't want to be seen: Hailey and Justin attempted to keep a low profile while out and about

Downcast: Justin didn't appear too thrilled when out and about on Monday

He too took to social media on Sunday to post of photo of his lady love wearing a necklace he'd made her.

'I made her necklace,' he captioned.

Hailey and Justin wed in front of their friends and family two weeks ago in South Carolina.

Since then, more pictures have been emerging of the loved-up couple from their special day.

Love: Hailey also took to her Instagram Stories to share a monochrome shot of Justin carrying her with his face in her chest

Arts and crafts: Justin took to social media on Sunday to post of photo of his lady love wearing a necklace he'd made her

Wedding: Friday saw the Vogue model's stylist share some gorgeous new shots and behind-the-scenes moments

Friday saw the Vogue model's stylist share some gorgeous new shots and behind-the-scenes moments.

Hailey hit the dance floor in her shimmering pearl white Vera Wang gown, which reached down to the floor.

The outfit featured thick straps, one of which had fallen down around her arm in the commotion, and the low-cut top highlighted the catwalk star's cleavage.

'The happiest bride I ever did see. Thank you @verawang for @haileybieber custom dress she danced the night away in it. And yes duh - sneakers,' captioned Maeve Reilly.

Justin and Hailey's religious ceremony took place September 30 at the Palmetto Bluff Hotel in Bluffton, South Carolina.
